content.raw: I like this a lot better.  It feels more intuitive to use.  I'm basically ready to approve this except for the build failure on Windows.  My guess is that you got caught up in the few days where Windows was just failing everything, so re-kicking it should make the build pass.
content.html: I like this a lot better. It feels more intuitive to use. I'm basically ready to approve this except for the build failure on Windows. My guess is that you got caught up in the few days where Windows was just failing everything, so re-kicking it should make the build pass.
